content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Crude Oil Extraction and Power Generation Structure at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- PumpJack (position: 17.5, 40.5) extracting crude oil
- StorageTank (position: 12.5, 40.5) storing crude oil
- Boiler (position: 22.5, 41.0) generating steam
- SteamEngine (position: 26.5, 41.5) generating power
- PipeGroup connecting PumpJack to StorageTank (positions: 11.5, 38.5 to 18.5, 38.5)
- PipeGroup connecting Boiler to SteamEngine (positions: 22.5, 39.5 to 29.5, 39.5 and 29.5, 41.5)
- ElectricityGroup connecting SteamEngine to PumpJack (poles at positions: 26.5, 43.5; 20.5, 41.5; 22.5, 43.5)

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when accessing non-existent attributes of entities:
  - The 'StorageTank' object has no attribute 'contents'. Use the correct attribute or method to access the fluid level or contents.
  - The 'StorageTank' object has no attribute 'fluidbox'. Check the correct attribute or method to access the fluid level or contents.
* Errors when inspecting inventory of entities:
  - Could not inspect inventory of name='storage-tank'. Check if the entity is valid and if the inventory can be inspected.
* Tips:
  - Ensure that the entity has the attribute or method you are trying to access.
  - Check the entity's type and its available attributes and methods.

### NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 

 Important variables that have been assigned:
- storage_tank (type: StorageTank)
- pumpjack (type: PumpJack)
- boiler (type: Boiler)
- steam_engine (type: SteamEngine)
